overview: Silvia Dellai’s dance academy is everything you’d imagine it to be… and everyone’s invited! With a teacher as sexy as Silvia around, you’d be forgiven for struggling to focus, and it turns out that not a single one of her students can resist her temptation either! There’s John Price, a lucky boy who gets a special session after class when Silvia finds out about his recent breakup. Lucky Bee, a curious girl who has come to learn to dance with her boyfriend. Eveline Dellai, a student who prefers to take the classes online. And Isabella de Laa, a girl who will practice at home with her man while Silvia is on video call. She may call them dance lessons, but we all know what’s really on Silvia’s curriculum, and you can enjoy her wild antics right here in Private Movies, Hot Dancers!
title: Hot Dancers
